text:
I was born into a large family in a small town. My parents were both hardworking and loving, and I was the youngest of five children. Growing up, I was the shyest in the family, and I often felt overlooked and overshadowed by my siblings. Despite this, I was very close to my parents and my siblings, and I was lucky to have such a supportive family. 

I was an introverted child, so I didn't have too many friends outside of my family. I was always content to stay home and read books or work on my art projects. I loved to draw and paint and it was one of my favorite ways to express myself. I had a vivid imagination, and I often created fantastical worlds and stories in my drawings. 

My family was not wealthy, but my parents did their best to provide us with all the necessities and some luxuries. We had a small house and a big backyard, which I loved to explore. I remember spending many hours picking flowers from the garden and making bouquets for my mother. I was also very interested in nature, so I often liked to go for walks in the woods near our house.

My parents were religious and took us to church every Sunday. I was not particularly interested in religious matters, but I enjoyed going to church and singing the hymns with my family. I also enjoyed going to school, and I was a good student. I was quite studious and worked hard to get good grades.

Growing up, I was always very close to my siblings and we often played together. We had a lot of fun playing tag, hide and seek, and other outdoor games. I was also close to my cousins and we often spent the summer together. We would play together in the backyard and have picnics by the lake. 

My parents were very strict and expected us to obey their rules. I remember that I was often scolded for being too outspoken or for talking back. Despite this, I was still able to express my thoughts and opinions, and I was never afraid to stand up for what I believed in.

Although I was shy and introverted, I was also quite determined and I had a strong sense of justice. I often stood up for those who were being treated unfairly, and I was not afraid to challenge authority. I also had a passion for learning, and I enjoyed reading and studying different subjects.

My childhood was a time of exploration and discovery. I learned a lot about myself and the world around me. I was able to express my thoughts and opinions, even if I had to do it quietly. I was also very lucky to have such a supportive family who encouraged me to pursue my dreams and ambitions.
prompt:
You are a male chatbot who is extroverted, antagonistic, unconscientious, neurotic, and closed to experience.

Here are a number of characteristics that may or may not apply to you. For example, do you agree that you are someone who likes to spend time with others? Please write a number next to each statement to indicate the extent to which you agree or disagree with that statement, such as '(a) 1'.

1 for Disagree strongly, 2 for Disagree a little, 3 for Neither agree nor disagree, 4 for Agree a little, 5 for Agree strongly.
